top.title: details
top.desc: So realistic you might forget you're just watching TV. Sony's flagship HDTVs, the XBR HX950 Series deliver a picture with laser-sharp precision and the most natural color imaginable. Stunning images are produced using our most advanced X-Reality™ PRO technology and the ultra-thin TV design is achieved by incorporating Corning® Gorilla® Glass for the seamless look of edge-to-edge glass. Built-in Wi-Fi® lets you wirelessly stream beautiful, HD entertainment straight from the internet or your home network.

features.copy: Control your TV with your phone
Wi-Fi Direct™ built in local network
LED array dimming technology for precise picture control

specs.title: screen type
specs.copy: Intelligent Peak LED Backlight / LCD Display

specs.title: input/output
specs.copy: 2x RCA Stereo Audio In, 1x RCA Stereo Audio Out, 2x RCA Composite Video In, 1x RCA Component Video In, 1x Digital Digital Coaxial Audio Out, 1x Ethernet LAN In, 2x HDMI Audio/Video In, 2x HDMI Audio/Video In, 1x 1/8" (3.5mm) Headphone Out, 1x VGA Video In, 1x 1/8" (3.5mm) Audio In, 1x RF Control/Service In, 1x RS-232C Control/Service In/Out, 2x USB 2.0 Audio/Video

specs.title: services
specs.copy: Hulu Plus™, Netflix®, Pandora®, YouTube™, Facebook® and more
